snippet.title: Aerofly FS 2 Flight Simulator - Official Trailer PC Version
snippet.description:
This is a trailer of our Flight Simulator Aerofly FS 2. AeroFly FS 2 is available for Microsoft Windows, Apple iOS and Google android.
  Microsoft Windows: http://store.steampowered.com/app/434030
  Apple iOS version at https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/aerofly-2-flight-simulator/id946434924?mt=8
  Google Android https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.aerofly.aerofly2android
